ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Geetha Vignesh has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Senior .Net developer at Payless Shoe source. Geetha has extensive knowledge of Microsoft ASP.NET, XML, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Microsoft C-SHARP, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, LINQ, Microsoft .NET Technology, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets, Windows Communiciation Foundation, Visual Basic .NET, Seagate Crystal Reports, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, ADO, Web Services, UML/OMT, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, JavaScript, Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Presentation Foundation, VSS, Microsoft SQL Server, AJAX, jQuery, XSLT, Visual Basic, Stored Procedures, Software Development Life Cycle, SQL, SDLC, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft Silverlight - WPF/E, Microsoft Internet Information Server, MS Visual SourceSafe, XML Schema, Scrum Methodology, MVC, Framework, Class Diagrams, Visual Basic for Applications, Retrieve, Regression Testing, PeopleSoft, Object Oriented Methodology, MicroStar International, Manual Testing, GUI Applications, Expression Blend, Agile Methodology, Active Server Pages. So far Geetha has not gained any managerial experience.
